examples: Before the birth of the man's child, he said: "I want a son , not a daughter."

definitions.definition: A male adopted person in relation to his adoptive parents.
A male person who has such a close relationship with an older or otherwise more authoritative person that he can be regarded as a son of the other person.
A male person considered to have been significantly shaped by social conflict .
examples: He was a son of the mafia system.

definitions.definition: A person regarded as the product of some place.
A familiar address to a male person from an older or otherwise more authoritative person.
( UK , New York City , colloquial ) An informal address to a friend or person of equal authority.
( computing ) The current version of a file , derived from the preceding father file.

definitions.definition: Son cubano , a genre of music and dance blending Spanish and African elements that originated in Cuba during the late 19th century.

main_definition: ( music ) Son cubano , a genre of music and dance blending Spanish and African elements that originated in Cuba during the late 19th century.
